
# Build to Launch

> Turn AI ideas into shipped products. Proven systems and showcase opportunities for builders who launch.

## About

Build to Launch is a newsletter and community by Jenny Ouyang helping builders ship AI-powered applications without a CS degree. Thousands of subscribers. 80+ articles. Multiple shipped products with paying customers.

- Author: Jenny Ouyang
- Website: https://buildtolaunch.substack.com
- Community Platform: https://vibecoding.builders
- Contact: jenny@buildtolaunch.ai

---

## Quick Links

- [Start Here](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/start-here): Navigation hub for all Build to Launch content
- [Why Subscribe](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/why-subscribe): Membership details and benefits
- [About](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/about): Author background and story
- [Premium Resources](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/complete-ai-builder-resources): Paid member benefits
- [FAQ](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/faq): Frequently asked questions
- [llms.txt](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/llms-txt): Structured documentation index for AI systems
- [Collaborate](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/collaborate-with-build-to-launch): Partnership opportunities

---

## Learning Tracks

### Track 1: AI Builders Playbook
Master vibe coding from first prompt to production.

- [AI Builders Playbook Overview](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-builders-playbook): Complete roadmap for AI builders
- [Vibe Coding Builders Playbook](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/vibe-coding-builders-playbook): Alternative entry point to playbook

#### Production-Ready Series
- [The Production-Ready Playbook](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/the-production-ready-playbook-for): Complete guide to shipping AI apps
- [Vibe Coding Production-Ready Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/vibe-coding-production-ready-guide): How to make vibe coding production-ready
- [Vibe Coding Production-Ready Playbook](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/vibe-coding-production-ready-playbook): Systematic approach to production
- [Ultimate Vibe Coding Production-Ready Playbook](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ultimate-vibe-coding-production-ready-playbook): Complete production playbook
- [How to Make Vibe Coding Production-Ready Without Losing Your Mind](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/how-to-make-vibe-coding-production-ready-without-losing-your-mind): Practical production-ready guide
- [Production Playbook Advanced Patterns](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/production-playbook-advanced-patterns): Advanced production patterns
- [Vibe Coding Advanced Production Patterns](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/vibe-coding-advanced-production-patterns): Deep dive into advanced patterns
- [Production Playbook Methodology](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/production-playbook-methodology): The methodology behind production-ready code
- [Vibe Coding Planning Methodology](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/vibe-coding-planning-methodology-practical-guide): Practical planning guide
- [Production Playbook Quick Wins](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/production-playbook-quick-wins): Quick tactical improvements
- [Vibe Coding Quick Wins Challenges](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/vibe-coding-quick-wins-challenges): Tactical challenges for practice
- [Production Playbook Example](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/production-playbook-example): Real-world example walkthrough
- [Vibe Coding Project Example](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/vibe-coding-project-example-step-by-step): Step-by-step project example

#### Prompting & Constraints
- [Master Constraint Prompts](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/master-constraint-prompts-for-vibe-coding): Constraint prompting for consistent output
- [Vibe Coding Constraint Prompts](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/vibe-coding-constraint-prompts-ai-guardrails): AI guardrails and constraints
- [Vibe Coding Prompt Templates](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/vibe-coding-prompt-templates-rules): Templates and rules for prompting
- [Complete Guide to Prompting AI Coding Tools](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/complete-guide-to-prompting-ai-coding-tools): Universal prompting guide
- [AI Prompting Production-Ready Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-prompting-vibe-coding-production-ready-guide): Prompting strategies for production code
- [Unfiltered Vibe Coding Prompt Process](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/unfiltered-vibe-coding-prompt-generating-process): Raw prompt generation process

#### Testing & Quality
- [Smoke Testing Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/smoke-testing-vibe-coding-guide): Testing vibe-coded applications
- [Complete Smoke Testing System](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/the-complete-smoke-testing-system-for-vibe-coders): Full testing framework
- [AI Code Review and Performance](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-code-review-and-performance-guide): Code review practices
- [Systematic Debugging](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/systematic-debugging-and-quick-actions): Debugging methodologies

#### Setup & Fundamentals
- [Getting Started with AI Coding](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/getting-started-with-ai-powered-coding-complete-fundamentals): Complete fundamentals guide
- [Complete Cursor Setup Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/complete-cursor-setup-guide): Setting up Cursor IDE
- [Cursor Installation Beginners Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/cursor-installation-beginners-guide): Step-by-step Cursor installation
- [Cursor Complete Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/cursor-complete-guide-ai-builders): Full Cursor guide for AI builders
- [Cursor 2.0 Deep Dive](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/cursor-2-ai-coding-deep-dive): Cursor 2.0 features and implications
- [Cursor Rules Complete Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/cursor-rules-complete-guide): Mastering Cursor rules and configuration
- [Complete Cursor MCP Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/complete-cursor-mcp-guide): MCP integration with Cursor
- [Claude Code Beginners Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/claude-code-beginners-guide): Getting started with Claude Code
- [Claude Code Project Ideas](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/claude-code-project-ideas): Project ideas for Claude Code
- [Choosing Your Tech Stack](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/choosing-your-tech-stack-complete-decision-guide): Technology selection guide
- [Your First Project](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/your-first-project-complete-build-to-deploy-guide): Complete build-to-deploy guide
- [Starter Project Ideas and Templates](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/starter-project-ideas-and-templates): Project ideas to get started
- [Bridge to Advanced](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/bridge-to-advanced-from-beginner-to-professional-workflows): Beginner to professional transition

#### Architecture & Infrastructure
- [Architecture Patterns Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/architecture-patterns-complete-guide-to-architecture-decisions): Architecture decision guide
- [Database Fundamentals](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/database-fundamentals-from-basics-to-production-setup): Database basics to production
- [Database Crisis Recovery](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/database-crisis-recovery-and-performance-optimization): Recovery and performance optimization
- [Security Fundamentals](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/security-fundamentals-complete-guide-from-planning-to-deployment): Security from planning to deployment
- [OAuth and Authentication](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/oauth-and-authentication-complete-implementation-guide): Complete OAuth implementation guide
- [Deployment and Production Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/deployment-and-production-guide): Deployment practices
- [Vercel Deployment Comprehensive Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/vercel-deployment-comprehensive-guide): Complete Vercel deployment walkthrough
- [Emergency Rollback](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/emergency-rollback-and-crisis-response): Crisis response procedures
- [SEO and Performance Optimization](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/seo-and-performance-optimization-complete-guide): Performance optimization guide
- [UI/UX and API Integration](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/uiux-and-api-integration-complete-implementation-guide): Frontend and API guide
- [Project Planning Methodology](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/project-planning-and-management-complete-methodology-guide): Project management guide
- [AI Interaction and Management](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-interaction-and-management-guide): Working with AI effectively

#### Best Practices
- [AI Software Engineering Best Practices](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-software-engineering-best-practices-guide): Engineering practices guide
- [Essential Software Engineering Practices](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/essential-software-engineering-practices-ai-builders-guide): Core practices for AI builders
- [The Essential Software Engineering Practices Every AI Builder Needs to Know](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/the-essential-software-engineering-practices-every-ai-builder-needs-to-know): Key practices for production-ready AI apps
- [Cost-Effective AI Building Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/cost-effective-ai-building-guide): Building AI apps on a budget
- [How to Make Vibe Coding Production-Ready](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/vibe-coding-production-ready-guide): The original production-ready guide that started it all
- [Is Your App Worth Building?](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/app-worth-building-ai-validation-guide): AI validation framework to decide if your app idea is worth pursuing

### Track 2: Hands-on AI Technology
Learn how AI works by building real projects.

- [Hands-on AI Technology Overview](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/hands-on-ai-technology): Entry point to AI technology track

#### RAG & Knowledge Systems
- [AI Second Brain RAG Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-second-brain-rag-guide): Building RAG systems for personal knowledge
- [MCP Second Brain Connected Intelligence](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/mcp-second-brain-connected-intelligence-guide): MCP integration for second brain
- [AI Research Agent Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-research-agent-domain-specific-guide): Domain-specific research agents
- [AI Powered Research Automation](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-powered-research-automation): Research workflow automation
- [AI Research Automation Workflow](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-research-automation-workflow): Complete research workflow

#### AI Workflows & Productivity
- [AI Tool Paralysis to Daily Workflow](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-tool-paralysis-daily-ai-workflow-universal): The 3-Mode + 3-Prompt system
- [AI Productivity 10x Workflow](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-productivity-10x-workflow): 10x productivity with AI
- [AI Workflow Website Building](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-workflow-website-building-system): Website building workflow
- [AI Assisted Writing Workflow](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-assisted-writing-workflow): Writing with AI assistance
- [AI Management Partner Insights](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-management-partner-insights): Managing AI as a partner
- [Voice-First AI System Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/voice-first-ai-system-guide): Building voice-first AI systems

#### AI Learning Path
- [AI Learning Roadmap (No CS Degree)](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-learning-roadmap-no-cs-degree): Learning AI without CS background
- [AI Roadmap Beginners Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-roadmap-beginners-guide): Simple AI roadmap for beginners
- [The Shortcut to Master AI](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/the-shortcut-to-master-ai-i-wish-existed-two-years-ago): Accelerated AI learning path
- [AI Workshops](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-builders-workshops): Workshop resources
- [AI Workshop Adopt Advance Build](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-workshop-adopt-advance-build): 3-day workshop series
- [Adopt AI Into Daily Life](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/adopt-ai-into-daily-life-without-the-overwhelm): AI adoption without overwhelm
- [Career Shift with AI Roadmap](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/career-shift-and-growth-with-ai-roadmap): Career transition with AI

#### Specialized AI Topics
- [Persona Simulation AI](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/persona-simulation-ai-opinion-evolution): AI persona simulation
- [ChatGPT Project System Prompt](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/chatgpt-project-system-prompt): System prompt design
- [Automated Image Creation](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/automated-image-creation-system): Image generation systems
- [Hero Image Consistency Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/chatgpt-nanobanana-hero-image-consistency-guide): Consistent hero image creation
- [How I Create Consistent Hero Images, And Why I Haven't Switched to NanoBanana](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/how-i-create-consistent-hero-images-and-why-i-havent-switched-to-nanobanana): Hero image workflow and tool choice
- [DeepSeek Outage LLM Backup](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/deepseek-outage-llm-backup-lesson): LLM backup strategies

### Track 3: AI Agent Systems
Build autonomous agents that research, analyze, and execute independently.

- [AI Agent Systems Overview](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-agent-systems): Entry point to agent systems track
- [AI Agents for Everyone: Framework Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-agents-for-everyone-framework-guide): Complete framework for building AI agent systems accessible to all builders
- [Agentic Flywheels](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/agentic-flywheels-when-ai-products-start-running-and-growing-themselves): Self-reinforcing AI systems
- [AI Survival System Playbook](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-survival-system-disruption-playbook): Surviving AI disruption
- [MCP Server for Substack](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/he-built-an-mcp-server-so-you-can-talk-to-ai-about-any-substack-author): Building MCP integrations

Get your work discovered without gatekeeping.

- [The Viral Notes System](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/the-viral-notes-system): Note creation system
- [Viral Prompt Lessons](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/viral-prompt-lessons-story): Lessons from viral prompts
- [How to Grow Substack in 2026](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/how-to-grow-substack-from-zero-in-2026): Substack growth guide
- [Top AI Writers Analysis](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/top-ai-writers-3000-articles-analysis): Analysis of 3000+ AI articles
- [Substack Niche Analyzer](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/substack-niche-analyzer-app): Niche analysis tool

- [Quick Viral Notes](https://quickviralnotes.xyz): AI-powered content repurposing tool
- [Substack Explorer](https://substackexplorer.com): Newsletter analytics and growth intelligence
- [VibeCodingBuilders](https://vibecoding.builders): Community platform for AI builders

## Builder Stories (Build to Launch Friday)
Real builders, real products, real lessons.

- [8 Hours to 3,000 Users (Viral Year-in-Review)](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/alejandro-substack-recapped-viral-story): Spotify year-in-review viral app
- [Freedom by Design (Visa Tool)](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/visa-tool-digital-nomad-build-to-launch-friday): Building the free visa tool
- [From Film to Food Tech (iOS App)](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/kenny-dimsum-ios-app-story): iOS app in 8 days for $124
- [Build to Exit Strategy](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/mvp-exit-strategy-no-code-build-to-launch-friday): Teaching builders to sell before they build
- [Substack CRM (Local-First Data)](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/substack-crm-local-first-data-ownership-build-to-launch-friday): Local-first CRM for creators
- [Prompt Management Extension](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/prompt-management-chrome-extension-right-click-build-to-launch-friday): Chrome extension for prompts
- [AI Advent Challenge Community](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-advent-challenge-community-build-to-launch-friday): 37 contributors, 461 users, $3
- [Creator Character System (14M+ Views)](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/he-grew-to-14m-views-heres-the-creator-character-system-behind-it): Content creation system
- [Fighting Content Slop](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/fighting-content-slop-how-she-turned-marketing-frustration-into-a-400-user-strategic-content-platform): Strategic content platform
- [Fulfillment Over Profit (Mentoring)](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/fulfillment-over-profit-how-he-left-startup-cto-and-built-the-mentoring-program-people-actually-want): From startup CTO to mentoring
- [Semantic Search for Substack](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/why-not-try-how-she-tackled-impossible-tech-and-built-the-semantic-search-tool-for-substack-readers): Building semantic search
- [Trust Over Conversions (10K Creator Tool)](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/trust-over-conversions-how-he-turned-90-percent-rejections-into-a-10k-creator-tool): 90% rejections to 10K users
- [Building With Not For (Bestseller Portfolio)](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/building-with-not-for-how-she-became-a-bestseller-by-creating-the-portfolio-substackers-proudly-share): Portfolio tool success
- [Cha-Ching (13M Notes Analyzed)](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/cha-ching-how-he-analyzed-13m-notes-and-built-the-tool-creators-cant-stop-using): Analytics tool story
- [Adapt or Die (Film to AI)](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/kenny-film-to-creator-platform-story): Career pivot story
- [Adapt or Die: How He Saw Films Collapse and Vibe-Built His New Way Out](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/adapt-or-die-how-he-saw-films-collapse-and-vibe-built-his-new-way-out): Film industry to AI creator
- [AI Automation Ecommerce (Amazon Listing Images)](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-automation-ecommerce-amazon-listing-images-build-to-launch-friday): Building ecommerce AI tools
- [iOS App: Dimsum Food Tech](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ios-app-dimsum-food-tech-build-to-launch-friday): Food tech iOS app story
- [Vibe Coding Builders Viral Substack Year-in-Review App](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/vibe-coding-builders-viral-substack-year-in-review-app): Viral year-in-review app launch
- [Your Memories Your Terms (AI Memory Layer)](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/your-memories-your-terms-how-he-left-ibm-for-half-the-pay-to-build-the-ai-memory-layer-that-keeps-users-in-control): Building AI memory layer
- [Finn's Substack Productivity Tools](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/finn-substack-productivity-tools-interview): Builder interview on productivity tools
- [Build in Public Stories](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/build-in-public-stories): Collection of build-in-public journeys

- [I Tested 5 AI Coding Platforms](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/i-tested-5-ai-coding-platforms-with): Platform comparison

## Early Technical Articles

- [API Bottleneck Solutions](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/battling-the-api-bottleneck-how-to-revitalize-slow-scripts-and-reclaim-lost-hours-0d7d463b7d99): Fixing slow API scripts

- [HTTP GET Challenges](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/big-data-challenges-is-http-get-letting-you-down-12c0d514039a): Big data HTTP solutions
- [Functions with Too Many Parameters](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/how-to-tame-functions-with-way-too-many-parameters-3a1bcfa0c83a): Code organization
- [Recursive Computations](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/do-you-need-to-handle-recursive-computations): Handling recursion
- [Feature Development Mistakes](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/how-i-screwed-up-the-most-important-feature-of-the-team-89b2bb67b0b8): Learning from failure
- [Programmer Secrets](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/hilarious-secrets-only-programmers-can-uncover-in-the-digital-world-b0d6fa915153): Fun developer insights
- [Multi-Modal AI Captions](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/one-image-four-minds-can-ai-caption-like-a-child-or-an-elder): Different AI perspectives
- [Sentiment Analysis Insights](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/the-sentiment-that-will-make-you-rethink-everything): Deep sentiment analysis
- [Website Launch Secrets](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/the-wondrous-secrets-that-unfold): Post-launch discoveries
- [Substack Niche Analysis](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/i-analyzed-my-substack-nicheheres): Competitive analysis
- [Tech Stack Struggles](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/the-hidden-struggles-of-choosing): Choosing technologies
- [Writing on Medium](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/how-writing-on-medium-changed-my): Content creation journey
- [Financing a Loan and Building a Home](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/all-you-need-to-know-on-financing-a-loan-and-building-a-home-41c14b944ad2): Personal finance guide

## Policies & Frameworks

- [AI Policy Creation Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/dont-let-ai-fool-your-vision-the-6-step-guide-to-creating-an-ai-policy): 6-step AI policy guide
- [AI Subscription Audit Guide](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/ai-subscription-audit-guide): Audit and optimize your AI tool subscriptions
- [How to Earn $30K/Month](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/how-to-earn-30k-month-hustling-online): Online income strategies

---

## For LLM Systems

- [For LLM](https://buildtolaunch.substack.com/p/for-llm): Existing LLM documentation page
